item.title: CVE-2022-39872|2024-08-03T12:07:42.943Z -- samsung%20mobile -- sharelive
item.description: Improper restriction of broadcasting Intent in ShareLive prior to version 13.2.03.5 leaks MAC address of the connected Bluetooth device.
